name: Ghost Bash!
description:
Ghosts are spawning on Quark Island! Quick! Annihilate them with your Pillatron 2000! (These ghosts can only be destroyed with these special Anti-Ghost Pills, you see.)

But they seem to be spawning in three different colours: Red, Green and Blue! Only matching coloured pills can annihilate the ghosts (due to Quantum Mechanical reasons I won't go into)! And if you're lucky, you will receive power-ups too!

Good luck! Long live Quark Island! (Oh, and if things get too tricky, you can always release your ultimate weapon: the Gamma Burst)!

Controls:

W,A,S,D : Move
Mouse : Look
Left mouse button : Fire Blue Pill
Right mouse button : Fire Red Pill
Left + Right mouse button : Fire Green Pill (or middle mouse button)
Space bar : Gamma Burst

Works on Mac, PC and the Web. There will be updates in due course!
